price: 不信安拉的迹象者，安拉必定不引导他们，而他们将受痛苦的刑罚。
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi lā yahdīhimu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
